definitions.definition: a flag or standard, especially a military or naval one indicating nationality.
examples: flag, standard, color(s), banner, pennant, pennon, streamer, banderole the ship flew a Greek ensign

definitions.definition: a sign or emblem of a particular thing.
examples: all the ensigns of our greatness

definitions.definition: a commissioned officer of the lowest rank in the US Navy and Coast Guard, ranking above chief warrant officer and below lieutenant.
the lowest rank of commissioned infantry officer in the British army.
